text: Nothridae is a family of oribatids in the order Oribatida. There are at least 3 genera and 70 described species in Nothridae. ==Genera== * Nothrus Koch, 1836 * Novonothrus Hammer, 1966 * Trichonothrus Mahunka, 1986 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Acariformes
title: Nothridae
